@dev ERC20 token

nodes.documentation:
@dev The constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract 
to the sender account and assigns them all tokens.

nodes.documentation:
@dev Burns a specific amount of tokens.
@param _value The amount of token to be burned.
nodes.name: burn

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows to transfer out the balance of arbitrary ERC20 tokens from the contract.
@param _token The contract address of the ERC20 token.
nodes.name: withdrawERC20Tokens

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows to transfer out the ether balance that was forced into this contract, e.g with `selfdestruct`
nodes.name: withdrawEther
